title: Looking for fresh lv30 players / low bronze players with low ranked games
body:
Looking to coach and help people who are just starting out in ranked or are in bronze 5 but have less than 10-20 ranked games played ( give or take ) add me IGN : SNLPER , will provide further details when requested but main priority is to help players get hands on experience with the current meta and will answer any questions at the current time.

thanks, hope to hear from some of you!

replies.body: Hey I'm bronze two if your keen but up to you
To be fair though theres a HUGE difference between bronze and gold, and on top of that he's plat1/plat 2.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=m8tBB38d,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-13T04:43:23.992+0000)
>
> Gold coaching bronzes lmao....

was diamond1 last season on another account, now im only plat 1
I'd love some coaching, ive just checked you up and you seem to be pretty good at the game seeing ur kda and w/r in ranked. Hmu sometime - SMLTE :)

I'm a new level 30, but I haven't met the requirements of owning 20 champions to play ranked yet. I was just wondering why you would pose such a generous offer, what do you hope of gaining out of this deal? 

Many Thanks 
- Blanqe

> [{quoted}](name=Blanqe,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=m8tBB38d,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-13T01:26:50.881+0000)
>
> I'm a new level 30, but I haven't met the requirements of owning 20 champions to play ranked yet. I was just wondering why you would pose such a generous offer, what do you hope of gaining out of this deal? 
> 
> Many Thanks 
> - Blanqe

just offering my services, nothing better to do and want to build a better community, and spread better game knowledge and hope to improve individuals gameplay and experience in league of legends ! :) i like to see people climb and improve their skills, its a sweet satisfaction when you see your efforts and time put to good use with a good end result.
